name: Dataset Description
content:
Data Description:

This dataset is designed to support sales forecasting at the store-department-week level, incorporating multiple internal and external factors that influence sales performance. The primary goal is to predict the weekly_sales for each department in each store for a given week.

The dataset includes the following columns:

  • Store (integer): Unique identifier for each retail store.
  • Date (string): The week-ending date for the transaction data.
  • IsHoliday (string): Indicates whether the week includes a special event or holiday (True or False).
  • Type (string): Store format category (e.g., A, B, or C) based on size and assortment.
  • Size (integer): The square footage of the store.
  • Dept (integer): Unique department number within each store.
  • Weekly_Sales (double): Total sales for the department in that store during the week (target variable).
  • Temperature (double): Average weekly temperature in the region (in Fahrenheit).
  • Fuel_Price (double): Cost of fuel in the store's region.
  • MarkDown1-5 (string): Promotional markdown dollars applied to different product categories (some values missing).
  • CPI (double): Consumer Price Index, a regional economic indicator.
  • Unemployment (double): Regional unemployment rate.
